field.name: id
field.description: The ID assigned to the object associated with the specified url. This could be a product ID, category ID, or page ID.

field.name: canonical_url
field.description: The internal relative URL. If the specified url is a redirect, the query returns the redirected URL, not the original.

field.name: type
field.description: One of PRODUCT, CATEGORY, or CMS_PAGE.
